body.p:
Office of J. Abraham,
Attorney at Law,
Cincinnati, 12 Sept 1864
Gov Bramlette
Sir

The commissions issued to Joseph C Levi of New York City & myself to act as Commissioners for the State of Kentucky expire on the 3rd Oct proset. I respectfully ask the renewal of the same to Mr. Joseph C Levi, and that the office which I have held now for 12 years may be assigned to my son Victor Abraham to whom I ask that
a Commission may also issue.

The applicants are both fitted for the office & of good moral character. I enclose $10 which I understand to be the fee of the Secy of State. If the Commissions are issued please forward the same to me to this city

Comrs Deeds for New York & Ohio
apptd 14th Sept/64
J. C. Levi
V. Abraham
